import Link from 'next/link' import renderHTML from 'react-render-html' import moment from 'moment' const Card = ({ blog }) => { return (

{blog.title}

Posted by {blog.author.name} | Published{" "} {moment(blog.updateAt).fromNow()}

tags,categories

image
{renderHTML(blog.exerpt)} Read more
); }; export default Card;
